about_me.des: I am Junior Security Engineer at CyberSift and student at Coventry University, studying Ethical Hacking and Cyber Security Msci (Hons).

projects.laravel: Web application created on Laravel framework. Also used are particles.js, Bootstrap, Vue.js and MySQL. The application represents a social media for ethical hacking and cybersecurity at Coventry University.
projects.ocleap: ocLE4P is a customizable Local Enumeration and Privilege Escalation tool based on Python. The project is performed by my teammates and me.
projects.familycode: The purpose of this project is to break through binaries password using the brute-force method.

career.cybersift_des: CyberSift is a boutique IT Solutions company that places emphasis on high quality, expertise and individualised service to each of our customers. While our focus is on IT Security, we complement this with a variety of skills which our customers can call upon, such as specialised  software, bespoke development and Cloud Services.
career.eniware_des: EniWARE Open Source Association is dedicated to the development and creation of modern software solutions in the context of Industry 4.0. As well as the cloud-based solutions and technologies that surround us increasingly. With us you can discover the world of communications, Big Data analysis, wireless data transfer technologies, server platforms and more.
